Sentencas: The main drivers for anode recirculation are the increased fuel efficiency and the independence of the external water supply for the fuel pre-reforming process.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell system concepts with anode recycling

Sentencas: Different system flow-schemes have been defined and a set of parameters have been elaborated as basis for various calculations.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell system concepts with anode recycling

Sentencas: Taking into account the combinations of layout, cell type, fuel utilization, fuel, and recycling ratio the total number of cases modeled was about 220.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell system concepts with anode recycling

Sentencas: All calculated SOFC systems are on a high level of electrical net efficiency in the range of 50-66%.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell system concepts with anode recycling

Sentencas: The electrical and thermal efficiencies are mainly influenced by the fuel utilization.
Titulo: Analysis of solid oxide fuel cell system concepts with anode recycling

Sentencas: The layout itself, the choice of fuel gas or the type of cell have minor effects on the system efficiency.
